t:
be wanted.
Being shipwrecked in this deserted island, everyday I send out a message in a bottle to the ocean,
                  “SEND HELP”.



And every next-day, the ocean sends one back,
                  “NO”.
c:
I'm alone.



#Collab and share what feeling have you forgotten with time. #forgothow  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#loneliness #ocean #trapped #island #rejectedbyworld
